author: LEGOSLUG
title: Fantastic Set
review:
Here is my review of the Product Collection 66378. Enjoy. To start off I will review each set individually, then have a combined conclusion at the end.

LEGO SW 8085 Freeco Speeder

The Minifigures:

 *Anakin Skywalker : Double sided head, blue torso and grey legs.

*Thi Sen : New head/torso piece, Grey torso and legs.

The Build:

 The Build takes about half an hour, an it is a very interesting build too. The use of the parts is awesome, there is also a new element in the set as well. The finished model looks great, the new elements give it a sleek look.

Pros

* Cool new Minifigures.

* New pieces.

* Finished model looks good, and is strong.

Cons

* Stickers

* Should be 1 more minifigure-like a Clone, or another alien.

 

Set 7913 Clone Trooper Battle Pack

 

The Minifigures:

* 2x Bomb Squad Clone Troopers--These have Orange Printing.

* 1x Clone Commander--White with Green Printing.

* 1x ARF Trooper--White.

 

All of these minifigures are unique to the set.

 

The Build:

The Speeder is a simple build, takes 2 mins, lots of playability, and NO STICKERS.

Now, on to the Pros and Cons.

Pros

* Unique Minifigures.

* Cool new speeder.

* NO STICKERS.

Cons

* No one to fight, but solve that problem by buying the 7914 Mandalorian Battle Pack.

* LEGO could have included a plate for the minifigures to stand on, but they didn't.

 

Set 7914 Madalorian Battle Pack

 

The Minifigures:

 

* 4x Mandalorian Troopers--New printed style. Each of these minifigures come with a Jet Pack and a newly designed Helmet.

The Speeder: 

Average build, Good selection of pieces, takes about 5 mins. The minifigure does fall off (or the controls break off) when you seat a minifigure on it.

The Turret: 

Interesting build, a new technique used here I think, cool new piece, a rare piece, a minifigure can stand there at the controls with no difficulty, takes about 2 mins.

Now, on to the Pros and Cons.

Pros

* Unique Minifigures.

* Cool new speeder.

* New turret with unique pieces.

* Rare Piece.

* NO STICKERS.

Cons

* No one to fight, but solve that problem by buying the 7913 Clone Trooper Battle Pack.

* LEGO could have included a plate for the minifigures to stand on, but they didn't.

* It is TROUBLESOME for that minifigure to sit on the speeder!

 

Conclusion:

In Conclusion, This Product Collection is is definitly worth to buying, not only because you get the Freeco Speeder, but you get a minature army for each minifigure. If you are a fan of LEGO Star Wars, get it.

 

LEGOSLUG

P.S. Please see and rate my other reviews and bricklists.
